msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; Some writing on Verso
+ P.Cair. Inv. 57187; P.Iand. VII, 141; P.Mich. Inv. 2830; 4171; 4910

condition.ab: Regularly cut at the left and right hand sides. 2 Kollesis at the left hand side of the papyrus and at the middle of col.106. The papyrus has suffered damage, cut and several lacunae as a result of 4 folds; irregularly cut at the top and the bottom. No restoration is needed. (MA)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. Except for e few lines, the scribe has marked the lines with an oblique stroke going downwards towards the left edge, presumably he used it alternatively with the underline stroke as a sign of a new entry.
